gui.block_entities.delivery_station.mode: This Delivery Station will transfer Fluids
This Delivery Station will transfer Items
This Delivery Station will transfer Vim Energy
nedaire.enchiridion.chapter.advanced.bor: I'm a drill and I digging a hole, diggy diggy hole, diggy diggy hole! Place me on platform and rotate me with hammer. </recipe;nedaire:bore/>
nedaire.enchiridion.chapter.advanced.cru: Just like manual crusher, but your hand is finally free! Yea! Finally! </recipe;nedaire:crusher/>
nedaire.enchiridion.chapter.advanced.del: The most complicated and strange device. Can transport items, liquid or vim for 32 blocks range, depending on choosed mode. </recipe;nedaire:delivery_station/> Even can filter, what this this thing will deliver. Extract choosed thing from nearby placed device and transport it to connected receptor. For connect receptor just use hammer on it, and after that use hammer again on Delivery Station
nedaire.enchiridion.chapter.advanced.ext: Your personal cobblestone generator. And... A bit more then just cobblestone. But consume liquid for some recipes </recipe;nedaire:extruder/>
nedaire.enchiridion.chapter.advanced.flu: Find nearby liquids in world and fill them inside. WARNING! It's a hot thing, if has lava inside! </recipe;nedaire:fluid_filler/>
nedaire.enchiridion.chapter.advanced.fur: Just like typical furnace, but don't required any fuel. Oh, wait. I forgot, it's required energy. But, it's a big deal, yea? </recipe;nedaire:furnace/>
nedaire.enchiridion.chapter.advanced.gro: The best farmer helper. You wheat will growth MUCH more faster. And don't forget to supply it with energy. You even can place this magic crystal in liquid! </recipe;nedaire:diffuser/growth_crystal/>
nedaire.enchiridion.chapter.advanced.hoo: Help to keep your house clear. Don't forgot to clear this brilliant device </recipe;nedaire:hoover/>
nedaire.enchiridion.chapter.advanced.pla: It's just platform for blocks like Bore or Defensive Tower. They may be placed ONLY on platform, on top or bottom side. May be rotated with hammer. Bore mining result will expel from face of this block. Oh yea, almost forgot... Recipe... </recipe;nedaire:platform/>
nedaire.enchiridion.chapter.basic.corium: This is our nice looking metal. But you can not find this in world. Really, this is doesn't spawn. For getting it try place any iron ore at one block distance from terramorfer and wait a bit. Later this will be transformed in to corium. In all another ways Corium is pretty simple to any another metall. As material for instruments and armor it's a bit better then diamond
nedaire.enchiridion.chapter.basic.diffus: Interesting thing, which allow you to fill items with liquids power. It's looks like cauldron, but have have much more difficult internal structure and working mechanism Can be crafted from Skystone </recipe;nedaire:diffuser/> Hope you already crafted Terramorfer to get unlimited Skystone
nedaire.enchiridion.chapter.basic.exp_ex: Only way to transfer your experience to liquid state. Warning, it's deal solid damage! Be care! </recipe;nedaire:exp_extractor/>
nedaire.enchiridion.chapter.basic.fluid_: If you need a barrel - you find it! Gratz! </recipe;nedaire:fluid_storage/>
nedaire.enchiridion.chapter.basic.manual: Om nom nom nom nom... Hart' t`fu! But, to be honest, it's pretty simple grinder, which can help you get much more resource from ore or raw pieces. If you looking for crafting recipe, so, it's here </recipe;nedaire:manual_crusher/>
Those racks can help you deal with many different instruments. They working like shelf, but someone think they have another use... Maybe it's true, will see... </recipe;nedaire:pedestal/> </recipe;nedaire:holder/>
nedaire.enchiridion.chapter.basic.skysto:
This is basic block required for next steps of crafting. As any another block, this may be divided into nuggets and back </recipe;nedaire:conversion/nugget/skystone_to_skystone/> </recipe;nedaire:conversion/skystone_to_nugget/skystone/> 
But how it's can be obtained? Oh, that's pretty simple. Just place and stone block, like andesite, diorite, granite, regular stone and e.g in diffuser, fill it with 1 bucket of liquid experience and you will get your skystone</recipe;nedaire:diffuser/skystone/>
nedaire.enchiridion.chapter.basic.terram:
First, hard to understand thing, with strange working mechanism. Seems like little black hole emit... Wait, what? Black hole and emit something? Oh, strange, but ok, so... This emit some kind of particles which morph ordinary stone to skystone. But, first, you need to craft those thing </recipe;nedaire:terramorfer/> 
To get starting crafting resources try to find any village and make some trades or you can find core somewhere in world depths.
nedaire.enchiridion.chapter.basic.vim_ge:
All devices can be supplied with vim. But, you need generate it for start. Here you can find some generators.

    Solar Generator

</recipe;nedaire:generator/solar/> Just place it's under sky and enjoy results.
     Food Generator
   </recipe;nedaire:generator/food/> You need really huge amount of food, so supply this generator. And yea, the better food, you supply for generator, the more energy you get

      Mob Generator
   </recipe;nedaire:generator/mob/> This strange generator can eat nearly any mob. Cows, villagers, golems, zombies, raiders and much more. But you can get really huge amount of energy from this generator 
 Lightning Generator 
 Of course, lighting it's true source of energy. And now you can use even this a natural phenomenon for your own needs. </recipe;nedaire:generator/lightning/>
First release. Basic mechanics, like energy furnace, crusher, manual crusher, delivery station and more

Added: 
• Experience fluid
• Experience Extractor
• Lightning generator
Fixed:
• Huge amount of bugs

Added: 
• Platform Block
• Bore Block
• Some fixes and internal reworks
